description.narrative:
Additional detail on PEPFAR financial information and terminology can be found at https://data.pepfar.gov/financial. The PEPFAR IATI activity file and PEPFAR IATI Activity File User's Guide can be found at https://data.pepfar.gov/additionalData
Measure Evaluation will support USAID implementing partners to adapt/customize the Routine Data Quality Assessment (RDQA) tool to enable them to internally assess the quality of their data and strengthen their data management and reporting systems. Measure Evaluation will support USAID to perform external data quality audits, where needed. Measure Evaluation will provide capacity building in data demand and use, to ensure that key populations programs implemented by NGOs and the MOH are responsive to the data from program implementation and surveys, such as the BSS, DHS and PLACE. Funds allocated for Program Element HL.1.14: Strategic Information. HIV/AIDS behavioral and biological surveillance, facility surveys, monitoring partner results, reporting results, supporting health information systems, assisting countries to establish and/or strengthen such systems, and related analysis and data dissemination activities fall under strategic information. objectives
MEASURE Evaluation Phase IV - The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

participating-org.narrative: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

organisation.narrative: Office of the Global AIDS Coordinator

mailing-address.narrative: 2100 Pennsylvania Avenue, Suite 200, Washington, DC 20522, USA

policy-marker.narrative: The U.S. President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief (PEPFAR) is the U.S. government's response to the global HIV/AIDS epidemic and represents the largest commitment by any nation to address a single disease in history.

title.narrative: Annual Reports to Congress on the President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief
PEPFAR Fiscal Year 2019 Country Operational Plan Guidance
Audit of the Department of State’s Coordination and Oversight of the U.S. President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief
